document_data.name: Buldo Silvermane
document_data.source: Shadowdale: The Scouring of the Land
document_data.mainbody: '''Buldo Silvermane''' was the founder of [[The Old Skull Inn]] in Shadowdale.
document_data.History: As of [[1375 DR]], Buldo had been dead for decades and long since left ownership of the Old Skull to his daughter, [[Jhaele Silvermane|Jhaele]].
